snippet: A helicopter officer discovered a patch of 1,500 plants growing in an industrial park on the city’s far South Side.
abstract: Chicago police are investigating a patch of 1,500 marijuana plants growing in an industrial park, what is described as largest such discovery outdoors in a city.
lead_paragraph: A helicopter officer discovered a patch of 1,500 plants growing in an industrial park on the city’s far South Side.

headline.seo: Unlikely Marijuana Crop Found in Chicago
headline.main: Unlikely, and Large, Marijuana Crop Is Found in a Chicago Industrial Park
headline.print_headline: Unlikely, and Large, Marijuana Crop Is Found in a Chicago Industrial Park
